content.question: The sentence declares that Augustus will

choices.label: begin a time of peace for Rome and extend the empire
extract riches from Latium to wage wars against distant lands
have demigod children who will become emperors in far-off lands
use family money to rule over Latium and make peace with foreign empires

content.answer: begin a time of peace for Rome and extend the empire

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
